Package Controller.Utilities

Class AudioManager

java.lang.Object
Controller.Utilities.AudioManager
public class AudioManager extends Object
Class used to manage all the audio usages, playing and stopping clips, setting volumes.
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

    static enum

    Background music CALM_BACKGROUND

    • convert

      private Function<Integer,Float> convert
      The range of values available for the FloatControl volume goes from -80 to 6. Under -50 the volume is almost mute so we convert the volume from 0 to 100 to the corresponding from -50 to 6. If the volume is 0, then -80 is returned.

    • getPathAudio

      private String getPathAudio(String filename, String folder)
      Returns the full path of the file to search, combining the default audio path, the folder, the name and the extension .wav
      Parameters:
      filename - - the name of the file to search
      folder - - the folder to search in
      Returns:

    • getAudioFile

      private File getAudioFile(String filename)
      Searches for the .wav file given the filename int the gamemode specific folder. If the file exists then it is returned, otherwise it returns the file in the common folder
      Parameters:
      filename - - the name of the file to search
      Returns:
      the file found

    • stopEffect

      public void stopEffect()
      Stops the current effect playing

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume(int value)
      Sets the music volume to the given value, if the music is playing it gets updated
      Parameters:
      value - - the volume from 0 to 100
